plot: A small island in the Libyan Sea. A frontier. A place of exile. A hidden refuge. For some, the legendary Homeric Ogygia, island of the nymph Calypso, where Odysseus remained for seven years...
title: Gavdos. Ekei sto Noto
plot_es: A small island in the Libyan Sea. A frontier. A place of exile. A hidden refuge. For some, the legendary Homeric Ogygia, island of the nymph Calypso, where Odysseus remained for seven years...
plot_en: A small island in the Libyan Sea. A frontier. A place of exile. A hidden refuge. For some, the legendary Homeric Ogygia, island of the nymph Calypso, where Odysseus remained for seven years...
